0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom light”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill is used to Control, Configure and Status Reporting for SmartLiving products. For more details, please visit https://smartliving.net.in.
Once you have products installed at your end, you will need a Cloud Login Credentials to access these devices from alexa. For more details email us at contactus@smartliving.net.in
